author: Just Jared
title: 'The Voice' 2017: Season 12's Celeb Mentors Revealed!
text:
The upcoming 12th season of The Voice is premiering in exactly one month and NBC has announced the stars set to be guest mentors to the contestants!
Once the four coaches – Adam Levine , Blake Shelton , Gwen Stefani , and Pharrell Williams – have formed their teams, they will be joined by the guest advisors for the battle rounds. 
The mentors for each of the teams feels very fitting this year. Sometimes in the past, the choices didn’t fit the coaches too well, but these are some great pairings!
Click through the slideshow to meet the four guest advisors…
